channel.title: Writing on Wildan's Workspace
channel.description: Recent content in Writing on Wildan's Workspace

item.title: How to be A Genius in Everything
item.description: A wise word once said, “Many things can be acquired with money, many by deceit, and many by falsehood. But, there is one thing that can be obtained only by honest labor, for which a king must work as hard as a coalman…, and that is knowledge.
